instruction: Add the spiciness rating to the below recipe.
input:
Ingredients:
– 1 lb ground pork
– 2 cloves garlic
– 1/2 cup diced onion
– 1 teaspoon dried oregano
– 1 teaspoon dried basil
output:
Ingredients:
– 1 lb ground pork
– 2 cloves garlic
– 1/2 cup diced onion
– 1 teaspoon dried oregano
– 1 teaspoon dried basil
– Spiciness rating: 1 (mild) to 5 (very spicy)
